ComicInfo.Title: A Monkey Eating Lemons; A Special Toast; What Cums Around Goes Around; Strangers in the Night
ComicInfo.Summary: Spain's El Bute brings you the steamy premier issue of pure easy-going, nonchalant, and apathetic sex. From the European pages of Blue and Kiss magazine comes the incredible talent of El Bute. From group sex to anal sex to oral sex and beyond, El Bute has a powerful and energetic way to bring out the lust in any sexual encounter. If you are a fan of great erotic art then don't miss this issue in this exciting new series.
